parameters.description: Unique userID, used for user tracking.

schema.title: X-User-Id
schema.description: Unique userID, used for user tracking.

parameters.name: x-user-id

audio_base64.title: Audio Base64
audio_base64.description: Base64 encoded string of the audio recording

expected_text.title: Expected Text
expected_text.description: The text the user is expected to be speaking

word_text.title: Word Text
word_text.description: The label for the given word. e.g: apple

ipa_label.title: Ipa Label
ipa_label.description: The IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) label for the phoneme

phoneme_score.title: Phoneme Score
phoneme_score.description:
Numeric pronunciation score out of 100 for the phoneme.
         You can interpret this as a nativness score 'How close was this phoneme to sounding like a native speaker ?'.
         A score above 70% usually represents a good phoneme pronunciation.

phonemes.title: Phonemes
phonemes.description: Detailed list of phonemes for the given word

word_score.title: Word Score
word_score.description: Pronunciation score at the word level, on a scale of 0 - 100

words.title: Words
words.description: Detailed list of words for the given content

overall_score.title: Overall Score
overall_score.description: Overall pronunciation score, on a scale of 0 - 100

expected_text.title: Expected Text
expected_text.description: The text the user was expected to speak

mock_ielts.title: Mock Ielts
mock_ielts.description: Mock estimated IELTS speaking score prediction

mock_cefr.title: Mock Cefr
mock_cefr.description: Mock estimated CEFR speaking score prediction

mock_pte.title: Mock Pte
mock_pte.description: Mock estimated PTE speaking score prediction

english_proficiency_scores.title: English Proficiency Scores
english_proficiency_scores.description: Estimated score predictions for english tests

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.description: An object potentially containing warnings about the content submitted

ipa_label.title: Ipa Label
ipa_label.description: The IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) label for the phoneme

phoneme_score.title: Phoneme Score
phoneme_score.description:
Numeric pronunciation score out of 100 for the phoneme.
         You can interpret this as a nativness score 'How close was this phoneme to sounding like a native speaker ?'.
         A score above 70% usually represents a good phoneme pronunciation.

lowest_scoring_phonemes.title: Lowest Scoring Phonemes
lowest_scoring_phonemes.description:
A list of the 3 lowest scoring phonemes,
         the first item in the list being the phoneme scoring the lowest

overall_score.title: Overall Score
overall_score.description: Overall fluency score, on a scale of 0 - 100

speech_rate.title: Speech Rate
speech_rate.description: The average speech rate in words per minute (WPM) of the speaker

speech_rate_over_time.title: Speech Rate Over Time
speech_rate_over_time.description:
The speech rate in words per minute (WPM) of the speaker sampled every 3 seconds.
         Can be used to build a graph of the speech rate.

text.description: Part of the text concerned for this metric

warnings.title: Warnings
warnings.description: An object potentially containing warnings about the content submitted

feedback_code.description:
Computer-friendly feedback code which you can use in your own code logic to provide custom
         behaviour or feedback.
         The possible codes are: TOO_SLOW | NORMAL |TOO_FAST

enum: You are speaking at a normal pace.
allOf.title: SpeechRateFeedbackMessage

feedback_text.description:
User-friendly feedback text about the rate of speech.
         Indicating if the user is speaking at the correct pace, or too slow/too fast

speech_rate.title: Speech Rate
speech_rate.description: Feedback text about the rate of speech

feedback_code.description:
Computer-friendly feedback code which you can use in your own code
         logic to provide custom behaviour or feedback.
         The possible codes are: NORMAL | SOME_PAUSES | TOO_MANY_PAUSES

enum: You are speaking without making any long pauses.
You are making some long pauses when you speak. Try to make shorter pauses in between your sentences.
You are making too many long pauses when you speak. Try to make shorter pauses in between your sentences.
allOf.title: PausesFeedbackMessage

feedback_text.description:
User-friendly feedback text about the number of pauses.
         Indicating if the user is using too many of them.

pauses.title: Pauses
pauses.description: Feedback text about the number of speech pauses

feedback_code.description:
Computer-friendly feedback code which you can use in your own code logic to provide
         custom behaviour or feedback.
         The possible codes are: NORMAL | SOME_FILLER_WORDS | TOO_MANY_FILLER_WORDS

enum: You are speaking without using any filler words.
You are using some filler words when you speak. Try to avoid using filler words.
You are using too many filler words when you speak. Try to avoid using filler words.
allOf.title: FillerWordsFeedbackMessage

feedback_text.description:
User-friendly feedback text about the number of filler words.
         Indicating if the user is using too many of them.

filler_words.title: Filler Words
filler_words.description: Feedback text about the number of filler words

tagged_transcript.title: Tagged Transcript
tagged_transcript.description:
A version of the transcript containing custom HTML tags indicating
         the position of fluency metrics. Can be used to build a front-end visual UI

         A score above 70% usually represents a good phoneme pronunciation.

Computer-friendly feedback code which you can use in your own code logic to provide custom
         behaviour or feedback.
         The possible codes are: TOO_SLOW | NORMAL |TOO_FAST

enum: You are speaking at a normal pace.

ipa_label.title: Ipa Label
ipa_label.description: The IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) label for the phoneme

phoneme_score.title: Phoneme Score
phoneme_score.description:
Numeric pronunciation score out of 100 for the phoneme.
         You can interpret this as a nativness score 'How close was this phoneme to sounding like a native speaker ?'.
         A score above 70% usually represents a good phoneme pronunciation.

word_text.title: Word Text
word_text.description: The label for the given word. e.g: apple

ipa_label.title: Ipa Label
ipa_label.description: The IPA (International Phonetic Alphabet) label for the phoneme

phoneme_score.title: Phoneme Score
phoneme_score.description:
Numeric pronunciation score out of 100 for the phoneme.
         You can interpret this as a nativness score 'How close was this phoneme to sounding like a native speaker ?'.
         A score above 70% usually represents a good phoneme pronunciation.

phonemes.title: Phonemes
phonemes.description: Detailed list of phonemes for the given word

word_score.title: Word Score
word_score.description: Pronunciation score at the word level, on a scale of 0 - 100
